description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'NoteEditor' used for editing and displaying notes, including UI template, data management, and event handling.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves the current note or handles save failure; interacts with dataProvider.update.

methods.name: _setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title text and optionally triggers a save.

methods.name: _setBody
methods.description: Sets the body text and optionally triggers a save.

methods.name: onBackspace
methods.description: Deletes character from current focus field.

methods.name: onEnter
methods.description: Adds a new line to the body field if focused.

methods.name: onKey
methods.description: Handles character key input for editing title or body.
